tool.name: ALPHA CPT EFetch ALPHA

param.name: input
param.label: NCBI Protein or Genome Accession
param.help: Custom text box for accessions, must be separated by newline (enter)

param.label: Format of your returned Files
param.name: ret_format
param.option: Return both individual and multi versions

param.name: sleep
param.label: Amount to slow request to NCBI by; increase if errors occur

tool.help:
** WARNING : THIS IS AN ALPHA VERSION OF THE TOOL. IT DOES NOT WORK AS DESCRIBED IN THE CURRENT STATE. **
INPUT : An accession, or set of accessions separated by new line.
- Current version has manual entry of email. Due to the following (from NCBI): To make use of NCBI's E-utilities, NCBI requires you to specify your email address with each request. In case of excessive usage of the E-utilities, NCBI will attempt to contact a user at the email address provided before blocking access to the E-utilities.
OUTPUT : Requested file type (genbank or fasta) individually and/or combined together.
